person.persName: Elijah Brewer (Louisville, Kentucky, wagonmaker and coal merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, wagonmaker and coal merchant. Mercer County, Kentucky, native. Married to Frances "Fannie" Lee Brewer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on March 6, 1859. Father of Fannie Brewer, John Brewer, James Brewer, Annie Brewer, and Paulina Brewer. Wagonmaker in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Coal merchant in Louisville in 1858. Coal merchant in Louisville in 1860. Employed Elizabeth Barger and Barbara Hazely as servants in Louisville in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1860. Coal merchant in Louisville in 1861. Coal merchant in Louisville in 1865.
